# About us
Misaka Network LLC is a Wyoming registered LLC (Filling ID 2017-000756675).

We are a RIPE NCC LIR member and also run our own network [AS57695](http://bgp.he.net/AS57695).

# Features
- SolusVM Powered
- Native IPv6
- BGP Session Available
- 3 day Money Back Guarantee
- Full root access

# Offer

Use coupon code `LET170817` for **50%** OFF lifetime recurring discount in any plan.

Test results of RU-LED-SSD1024:

- [serverscope](https://serverscope.io/trials/kdo0)
- [91yuntest](https://www.91yuntest.com/5YlHm1)

Looking Glass: [http://ru-led01.lg.zeptovm.com/](http://ru-led01.lg.zeptovm.com/)

IPv4: `185.209.85.5`

IPv6: `2a0b:4342:2000:1::1`

## RU-LED-SSD1024 6.49 USD

- CPU **1 vCPU (E5-2630 v4)**
- Memory **1G DDR4**
- Storage **10G SSD (HW RAID10)**
- Bandwidth **1T (In + Out)**
- Uptime **2 \* 10Gbps**
- IPv4 **1 \* /32**
- IPv6 **1 \* /128**
- BGP Session **+ $15 Setup Fee**

[Purchase](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=12)
